author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: This traditional Catalan stew makes an opulent starter or summer lunch. Add more mussels if you can’t find clams.
name: Catalan Seafood Zarzuela Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 live mussels, scrubbed, and beards removed
300g firm white fish fillets, such as haddock or cod, pin-boned, skinned, and cut into bite-sized pieces
2 squid pouches, approx 175 g in total, sliced into 5mm thick rings
8 raw king prawns, shells on, deveined

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a deep-sided sauté pan over a medium heat and fry the onion for 10 minutes, covered. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the wine and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the stock, tomato purée, and saffron, and season. Return to a simmer, add the clams and mussels. Cook for 3 minutes.

Add the white fish, squid, and prawns, and cook for 2 minutes. Cover and cook for 5 minutes more. Discard any mussels or clams that do not open on cooking. Stir in the parsley. Serve with crusty bread.
